title: Adrian Wojnarowski and Dr. Abraar Karan
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski about the NBA's revised health protocols and the Kyrie Irving situation, then Dr. Abraar Karan of Harvard Medical School and Brigham & Women's Hospital provides expert commentary on whether the protocols will work.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
